title: Minimum Viable Relationships (MVR) Framework: Africa’s Prerequisite to MVP
description: Version 3 of the MVR framework. In high‑context markets, ventures fail without relational permission. MVR provides a quantifiable, auditable readiness gate (MVR‑I) that must precede MVP. This release specifies six indicators, validation architecture, and policy/AI tooling.
notes: Canonical title kept stable for indexing; manuscript filename reflects V3 subtitle for high-context markets.
